About           +           Serve           +           Transform           +           Advance           +           Redefine           +           Ethics & Compliance                      Reporting Index           
BRIGHTER FUTURES  |  2019 CSR Report63
DISCLOSURE TITLE EXPLANATION or LOCATION
416-2Incidents of noncompliance 
concerning the health and safety impacts of products and servicesDuring the reporting period, Alexion identified no new incidents of noncompliance with regulations concerning the health and safety impacts of Alexion products and services that rose to the level of materiality that would have required disclosure in our periodic reports filed with the SEC.
MARKETING AND LABELING
417-1Requirements for product and service information and labelingAlexion 2019 Form 10-K, Item 1 (Business: Government Regulation, Other Regulations)
417-2Incidents of noncompliance concerning product and service information and labeling Alexion 2019 Q3 Form 10-Q, Note 18 (Commitments and Contingencies: Contingent Liabilities)
417-3Incidents of noncompliance concerning marketing communications
Alexion 2019 Form 10-K, Note 11 (Commitments and Contingencies: Contingent Liabilities)
CUSTOMER PRIVACY
418-1Substantiated complaints concerning breaches of customer privacy and losses of customer dataPartially reported: Alexion 2019 Form 10-K, Item 1 (Business: Privacy, Data Protection and Information Security)
SOCIOECONOMIC COMPLIANCE 
419-1Noncompliance with laws and regulations in the social and economic area
Alexion 2019 Form 10-K, Note 11 (Commitments and Contingencies: Contingent Liabilities)
